Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've seen a lot of tutorials including the use of fuel ducts.

Now I have my KSP client at 0.23, but I can't seem to find the fuel duct under any tab.

Was it removed, renamed, do I need to unlock it?

Thanks!

It should be with the fuel tanks and engines, though it's a few steps up the tech tree if you're playing career mode. Also, some tabs have more than one page, with a button to advance on the lower right. I don't remember if fuel lines are on the first page right now.
Fuel lines are on the second page of the propulsion tab in sandbox mode.
You probably haven't unlocked them yet if you're in career more.
If you're in Career, it won't be unlocked until Fuel Systems on Tier 4. Folks have already said where it is in the sandbox; propulsion tab either way.

If you're in Career, it won't be unlocked until Fuel Systems on Tier 4. Folks have already said where it is in the sandbox; propulsion tab either way.

I'm playing in career mode.

I thought I had nearly researched all trees.

Guess I'll have to wait!

Thanks for all your responses!
